nodes.text: Urtagh was the name given to a bantha living on the planet Tatooine that was infected by the rakghoul plague during the rakghoul pandemic and grew to a massive size. The beast was slain in the Outlaw's Den region.
Urtagh appeared as a World Boss for the Rakghoul Pandemic World Event in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, which occurred in early 2011 and has since not been repeated.
